casebody.data:
COLEY, et al.
v.
STATE of NC, et al. No. 607A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2005. Philip R. Isley, G. Eugene Boyce, Raleigh, for Diana L. Coley, et al. Kay Linn Miller Hobart, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of December 2005 by Attorney General for extension of time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 10th day of February 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of December 2005."
